original: 袁尚部下。曹操攻鄴時，馬延、張顗臨陣倒戈，令袁尚軍潰敗，之後史書再無記述。在《三國演義》中，張顗於曹操赤壁之戰敗陣時，被甘寧斬殺。
text: Yuan Shang's subordinates. When Cao Cao attacked Ye, Ma Yan and Zhang Wei turned against each other, causing Yuan Shangjun to be defeated, and there was no further description in history books. In "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", Zhang Wei was beheaded by Gan Ning when Cao Cao was defeated in the battle of Chibi.
